alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 20 at 2:30PM PDT until March 22 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations in valleys of 3 to 8 inches. Higher snow accumulations in mountains of 10-20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...White Pine County, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 11 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow impacts could vary considerably based on elevation with higher summits and passes receiving several inches more of accumulation over the course of the event.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; White Pine County
